description: [XCSSET](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0658) collects contacts and application data from files in Desktop, Documents, Downloads, Dropbox, and WeChat folders.(Citation: trendmicro xcsset xcode project 2020)

external_references.description: Mac Threat Response, Mobile Research Team. (2020, August 13). The XCSSET Malware: Inserts Malicious Code Into Xcode Projects, Performs UXSS Backdoor Planting in Safari, and Leverages Two Zero-day Exploits. Retrieved October 5, 2021.
